title: Boo!
description: Mason and Shane are living the good life and looking forward to a happy Halloween.Things take a spooky turn with a desperate call from Gran. It seems she's in some ghostly trouble and the beauty and the bookworm will need to ride off to her rescue. Mason's got his trusty kindle and Shane's got his famous green jockstrap, but will they be enough to battle a spirit that seems to have his spectral eyes on Shane?CONTENT WARNING: THIS SHORT STORY CONTAINS DEPICTIONS OF M/M SEXUAL PRACTICES AND SHOULD BE READ BY ADULTS ONLY. IT ALSO CONTAINS A HORNY GHOST!
author: Nick Pageant
